categories: Category:Hyperspace: The Official Star Wars Fan Club

nodes.text: The Story of General Grievous: Lord of War

The Story of General Grievous: Lord of War is an online supplement to Unknown Soldier: The Story of General Grievous, an article in Star Wars Insider 86. The supplement is written by Abel G. Peña, and is an exclusive Hyperspace publication.

This supplement includes information on the origin of N-K Necrosis and his relation to Grievous, the Kaleesh Elite, what happened to his bodyguard droids after the Clone Wars, what Lig swords and Shoni spears are, and the name of his starfighter.
